outputs.output_descr: The project aims to promote positive attitudes among young people in relation to the Entrepreneurship and business, foster creativity, entrepreneurship, self confidence and develop a culture and entrepreneurship among young people to increase business base and enable a sustainable private sector develop Angolan plays an important role in the fight against poverty and personal progress. the project contributes to education reform which aims to a more practical and meaningful education in a changing society and the private sector has to develop human resources. specifically, the project will develop and introduce business education programs in secondary education in Angola and thus lay the foundation for its extension at the national level, reaching approximately 500,000 students.

project_descr: Entrepreneurship Curriculum in Secondary Schools Programme
